name: @fossalyze/privacy-friendly-iframe
description: Delay rendering an iframe until consent has been provided.

scripts.build: rm -rf ./build && rm -rf ./dist && tsc && mkdir -p ./dist/prod ./dist/lib && cp -r ./build/ ./dist/lib && terser ./build/pf-iframe.js --output ./dist/prod/pf-iframe.min.js
